#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define N 100000
typedef long long ll;
typedef long double ld;
ll M[ N + 2 ] , B[ N + 2 ];
int n;
ld f( ld x ){
	ld mini = 1e11;
	ld maxi = -1e11;
	for ( int i = 0 ; i < n; i++ ){
		mini = min( mini , (ld)M[ i ]*x + (ld)B[ i ] );
		maxi = max( maxi , (ld)M[ i ]*x + (ld)B[ i ] );
	}
	return maxi - mini;
}
int main(){
	ll k , x , b;
	cin>>n>>k;
	for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ){
		cin>>x>>b;
		M[ i ] = x;
		B[ i ] = b; 
	}
	long double lo = 0 , hi = k , m1 , m2;
	for ( int i = 0 ; i < 100 ; i++ ){
		m1 = ( lo*2 + hi )/3.0;
		m2 = ( lo*1 + hi*2)/3.0;
		if ( f( m1 ) < f( m2 ) ) hi = m2;
		else lo = m1;
	}
	printf("%.6f\n",(double)f(hi));
	
}
